purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 奖)
Antonyms: 懲
Pictophonetic: 將 indicates the sound; 犬 (dog) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
獎勵 [ jiǎng lì ]: to reward; reward (as encouragement)
獎金 [ jiǎng jīn ]: premium; award money; bonus
獎章 [ jiǎng zhāng ]: medal; Classifiers: 枚
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 將 [ jiāng ] the future, what will be; ready, prepared; a general
    • 犬 [ quǎn ] dog
heisig_chinese_memo: The general's St. Bernard dog wins an award for saving him during battle.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: School children, at the end of the school year, should recieve an award in the form of a big chocolate turtle.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " dog ", " will " save the sound. "Suowen" is based on the original meaning of using sound to drive dogs forward, but this usage is not seen in ancient books. "Shuowen": "Award, the dog will be sharp. From the dog, the sound will be saved." Duan Yucai's note: "<Mouth> said: "Shoo, make the dog sound." Extension is the comfort of all exhortations."

" Award " means exhortation and encouragement. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The 22nd Year of Zhaogong": "Jun Ruohui protects the town, he is indifferent, to reward the chaos, and the hope is lonely." Kong Yingdashu: "Reward, persuade." "Selected Works. Ren Yansheng's "The Three-Year Plan for Talents of the Tianjian": "Since the road to the promotion of awards, since Si is lonely, there should be good rules."

" Award " means assistance and support. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Eleventh Year of Xianggong": "Relief for disasters, sympathize with disasters, share likes and dislikes, and reward the royal family." "Book of Later Han. "Zhao Qi Biography": "Although Qi is desperate, he still wants to serve the country, and wants to ride a bull cart by himself. Nan said that Liu Biao can make his generals come to defend the court and work with the generals to reward the royal family."

" Award " means praise and recognition. "Guang Ya. Interpretation IV: "Award, honor." Such as "Book of the Later Han Dynasty." "Guo Tai Chuan": "His awards to the best scholars are as lessons learned." "Old Tang Book. "Liu Yuxi Biography": "At the end of Zhenyuan, Wang Shuwen worked in the East Palace, and the younger generations advanced, and more Lizhi was attached. Yu Xiyou was awarded the Shuwenzhi prize and treated him as a prime minister."

" Award " means reward. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "Zhang Wen Biography": "The predecessor of Wen Dong and the three counties, referring to the officials and the remaining soldiers. They are afraid of things and want to return quickly, so they are awarded with a halberd and a prestige." "New Tang Book. "Li Daliang Biography": "The King of Qin travels to the north, writes a prize for labor, bestows five horses, 50 paragraphs on silk."
humanum_short_description_en: From " dog ", " will " save the sound. "Suo Wen" is based on the original meaning of using sound to drive dogs forward.
humanum_full_description:
從「犬」，「將」省聲。《說文》以為本義是用聲音驅犬猛進，但古書中未見此用法。《說文》：「獎，嗾犬厲之也。从犬，將省聲。」段玉裁注：「〈口部〉曰：『嗾，使犬聲也。』厲之猶勉之也，引伸為凡勸勉之偁。」

　　「獎」表示勸勉、勉勵。如《左傳．昭公二十二年》：「君若惠保敝邑，無亢不衷，以獎亂人，孤之望也。」孔穎達疏：「獎，勸也。」《文選．任彥昇〈天監三年策秀才文〉》：「弘獎之路，斯既然矣，猶其寂寞，應有良規。」

　　「獎」表示輔佐、扶持。如《左傳．襄公十一年》：「救災患，恤禍亂，同好惡，獎王室。」《後漢書．趙岐傳》：「岐雖迫大命，猶志報國家，欲自乘牛車，南說劉表，可使其身自將兵來衛朝廷，與將軍并心同力，共獎王室。」

　　「獎」表示稱讚、嘉許。《廣雅．釋詁四》：「獎，譽也。」如《後漢書．郭太傳》：「其獎拔士人，皆如所鑒。」《舊唐書．劉禹錫傳》：「貞元末，王叔文於東宮用事，後輩務進，多附麗之，禹錫尤為叔文知獎，以宰相器待之。」

　　「獎」表示獎勵。如《三國志．吳書．張溫傳》：「又前任溫董督三郡，指撝吏客及殘餘兵，時恐有事，欲令速歸，故授棨戟，獎以威柄。」《新唐書．李大亮傳》：「秦王行北境，下書奬勞，賜馬五乘，帛五十段。」
humanum_short_description: 從「犬」，「將」省聲。《說文》以為本義是用聲音驅犬猛進。

從「 犬 」，「 將 」省聲。《說文》以為本義是用聲音驅犬猛進，但古書中未見此用法。《說文》：「獎，嗾犬厲之也。从犬，將省聲。」段玉裁注：「〈口部〉曰：『嗾，使犬聲也。』厲之猶勉之也，引伸為凡勸勉之偁。」 「 獎 」表示勸勉、勉勵。如《左傳．昭公二十二年》：「君若惠保敝邑，無亢不衷，以獎亂人，孤之望也。」孔穎達疏：「獎，勸也。」《文選．任彥昇〈天監三年策秀才文〉》：「弘獎之路，斯既然矣，猶其寂寞，應有良規。」 「 獎 」表示輔佐、扶持。如《左傳．襄公十一年》：「救災患，恤禍亂，同好惡，獎王室。」《後漢書．趙岐傳》：「岐雖迫大命，猶志報國家，欲自乘牛車，南說劉表，可使其身自將兵來衛朝廷，與將軍并心同力，共獎王室。」 「 獎 」表示稱讚、嘉許。《廣雅．釋詁四》：「獎，譽也。」如《後漢書．郭太傳》：「其獎拔士人，皆如所鑒。」《舊唐書．劉禹錫傳》：「貞元末，王叔文於東宮用事，後輩務進，多附麗之，禹錫尤為叔文知獎，以宰相器待之。」 「 獎 」表示獎勵。如《三國志．吳書．張溫傳》：「又前任溫董督三郡，指撝吏客及殘餘兵，時恐有事，欲令速歸，故授棨戟，獎以威柄。」《新唐書．李大亮傳》：「秦王行北境，下書奬勞，賜馬五乘，帛五十段。」

Liushutong characters (1)

獎字的基本解释

獎
jiǎng
古同“奖”。

獎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎng］
［《玉篇》子養切］
(1)助。
(2)成。
(3)欲。
(4)誉。
(5)嗾犬使凶狠。

獎字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獎； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页717第29
【廣韻】卽兩切，音槳。【玉篇】助也，成也，欲也，譽也，嗾犬厲之也。今作㢡。【廣韻】說文本作?。【集韻】从大作奬。詳大部奬字註。

獎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
獎字的起名意思

暂无。
